## RowGroup.Builder.update() method

Update anything but cells/downward growing cells/slots, because these need to be kept in sync.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(update: {
            y?: number;
            width?: number;
            height?: number;
            element?: Element;
        }): Builder;
```

|  update | { y?: number; width?: number; height?: number; element?: Element; } |  |
